channel.title: Network-Theory on Notes on AI4Science & Graph Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Network-Theory on Notes on AI4Science & Graph Theory

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 1 - Introduction
item.description: Comprehensive study notes for Chapter 1 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering fundamental concepts, mathematical definitions, and real-world network examples

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 10 - Network Processes
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 10 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering percolation, epidemic spreading, synchronization, and other dynamic processes on networks

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 11 - Community Structure
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 11 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering community detection methods, modularity optimization, and spectral clustering

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 12 - Network Inference
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 12 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering statistical inference, network reconstruction, and missing data imputation

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 13 - Network Dynamics
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 13 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering temporal networks, network evolution, and dynamic processes

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 14 - Network Control
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 14 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering network controllability, control theory, and applications to complex systems

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 15 - Multilayer Networks
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 15 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering multilayer networks, multiplex networks, and their analysis

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 16 - Network Resilience
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 16 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering network robustness, resilience measures, and failure analysis

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 17 - Network Optimization
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 17 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering network optimization, design principles, and optimization algorithms

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 18 - Future Directions
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 18 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering emerging trends, future research directions, and open problems in network science

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 2 - Technological Networks
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 2 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering Internet, power grids, transportation networks, and their structural properties

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 3 - Social Networks
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 3 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering social network analysis, data collection methods, and structural properties

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 4 - Information Networks
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 4 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering the World Wide Web, citation networks, and information flow dynamics

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 5 - Biological Networks
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 5 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering protein networks, metabolic networks, neural networks, and ecological networks

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 6 - Mathematical Foundations
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 6 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering graph theory, matrix representations, and mathematical foundations of network analysis

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 7 - Network Measures and Metrics
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 7 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering network measures, metrics, and their mathematical foundations

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 8 - Random Graphs
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 8 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering Erdős-Rényi model, configuration model, and random graph theory

item.title: Reading Notes: Newman's Networks Chapter 9 - Network Models
item.description: Study notes for Chapter 9 of Newman's 'Networks: An Introduction' covering small-world networks, scale-free networks, and other network generation models
